globalEvents.name: Open Crate 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Open Crate 2
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
Your shuttle lands right outside the small Imperial data center.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.

eventActions.theText:
Though Alliance Intelligence said that you should be able to avoid patrols if you arrived at the proper time, you soon encounter evidence to the contrary. 

“Freeze! You are trespassing on classified Imperial property and will be taken into custody.”

You immediately recognize the harsh sound of a voice processed through a stormtrooper helmet and turn to see a squad with their blasters ready.

This will make things harder, but your general objective hasn't changed. You need to get into the main server room.

{-} Doors are locked. A figure can attack a door (Health: 5, Defense: 1 {G}) to destroy it or interact with a door ({I}) to try and open it.
{-} The mission will progress when the heroes find the server room.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

{-} Doors are locked. A figure can attack a door (Health: 5, Defense: 1 {G}) to destroy it or interact with a door ({I}) to try and open it.
{-} The mission will progress when the heroes find the server room.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
As the virus infects the Imperial data stream, the readout on the monitors transforms almost immediately from comprehensible language to utter gibberish. Then, the power in the center flickers and dies, allowing you a covert escape.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 200 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
Cornered and out of options, you fight with desperation and just barely manage to escape.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} The Empire receives the <color="red">Royal Guard Champion</color> as a villain.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

eventActions.theText:
You start to work on the door lock.

{-} Test {I}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the door, then discard all strain tokens on the door. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText:
You make some progress, but the door still holds. You need to keep trying.

{-} Place 1 strain token on the door for each {B} result gained.

globalEvents.name: Security Breach
globalEvents.eventText: Behind the door lies the small entrance area of the data center.

entityProperties.name: Door 1
entityProperties.theText:
A security door leads into the entrance room of the facility.

{-} The door is locked. A figure can attack the door (Health: 5, Defense: 1 {G}) to destroy it or interact with the door ({I}) to try and open it.

eventActions.theText:
You start to work on the door lock.

{-} Test {I}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the door, then discard all strain tokens on the door. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText:
You make some progress, but the door still holds. You need to keep trying.

{-} Place 1 strain token on the door for each {B} result gained.

globalEvents.name: Guarded
globalEvents.eventText: The control room of the data center is full of terminals and workstations.

entityProperties.name: Door 2
entityProperties.theText:
A security door leads into the control room of the facility.

{-} The door is locked. A figure can attack the door (Health: 5, Defense: 1 {G}) to destroy it or interact with the door ({I}) to try and open it.

eventActions.theText: Two red-clad guards raise their weapons as you breach the room.

You start to work on the door lock.

{-} Test {I}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the door, then discard all strain tokens on the door. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText:
You make some progress, but the door still holds. You need to keep trying.

{-} Place 1 strain token on the door for each {B} result gained.

globalEvents.name: Server Room Opens
globalEvents.eventText: Finally, you have reached the server room. A rush of cold air meets you as you enter.

entityProperties.name: Door 3
entityProperties.theText:
A security door leads into the server room of the facility.

{-} The door is locked. A figure can attack the door (Health: 5, Defense: 1 {G}) to destroy it or interact with the door ({I}) to try and open it.

eventActions.theText: The data center's main server is busily processing data. This is your target.

entityProperties.name: Terminal 1
entityProperties.theText:
The central server of the data center is humming softly.

{-} A hero can interact with the terminal ({I} or {J}) to try and upload the virus.

eventActions.theText:
{-} A hero can interact with the terminal ({I} or {J}) to try and upload the virus.
{-} The Rebels win when the virus is uploaded.

{-} A hero can interact with the terminal ({I} or {J}) to try and upload the virus.
{-} The Rebels win when the virus is uploaded.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

You start to slice into the central server.

{-} Test {I} or {J}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the terminal, then discard all strain tokens on the terminal. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText:
You make some progress, but the Imperial security systems boot you out. You need to keep trying.

{-} Place 1 strain token on the terminal for each {B} result gained.

globalEvents.name: Nemesis
globalEvents.eventText: You hear a deep, cruel voice behind you: “You foolish rebels. I am glad you took our bait; I relish the opportunity for a good fight.”
